summary: **Star Trek: The Next Generation** is a popular science fiction TV show that aired from 1987 to 1994. Created by Gene Roddenberry, it's part of the Star Trek franchise and follows a new crew on the starship Enterprise, led by Captain Jean-Luc Picard (played by Patrick Stewart). The series explores space in the 24th century, aiming to discover new worlds and civilizations. It was a big success, leading to movies, more TV shows, and other media. The show won many awards and is still loved by fans today.
title: Star Trek The Next Generation
